CREDITOR SERVICER
About us Referral Login Start for free

Sell your services around real estate NPLs to any creditor worldwide

debtify provides NPL real estate brokers, real estate appraiser companies and foreclosure servicers with ready-to-use solutions to sell their products online and simplify their exposure to creditors via Plug-ins and APIs.

NPL real estate broker

Use our broker API to give banks and NPL servicers access to your broker power for appraisal and utilization of their real estate. Or use one of the many ready-to-go modules like Propertybase - one of the leading companies in real estate software - to get started. Our solution allows you to sell your services to creditors around the world and gives you access to our NPL broker community to develop your skills.

AVM companies and appraiser

Our debtify ecosystem allows you to market your AVM (Automated Valuation Model), real estate appraisals or geo-data services directly to banks and servicers. Your data can then be automatically integrated into the debtify tools for a better workout.

foreclosure/auction servicer

Our debtify foreclosure API gives secure access to creditors for your product offerings. debtify allows you to commercialize the sale of your services to creditors around the world and their workout partners.

Why use debtify solutions?

Distributing your services and products online has never been so simple!

Turnkey platforms to get started in a few days

Opt for the debtify solution to offer subscription to your products on our distribution channels to creditors around the world via a secure and customizable script.

An integrated third-party service hub to enrich your subscription journey

debtify provides third party partners with services that are already integrated into the subscription process, such as document verification, electronic signature or payment. The third-party services are enriched by our teams to offer the best possible subscription experience.

A secure Rest API that complies with banking standards to simplify data sharing

debtify offers a Rest API consisting of NPL real estate industry standards. Interactive documentation is also available for developers to test our business services and our accounting with third-party systems in real time.

Try debtify

Sign up in minutes, cancel anytime.

Join our community and get access to NPL real estate experts
